subject: Baseball
Stadiums and Arenas
lead_paragraph: Teams from the Negro leagues had a long and productive presence at Yankee Stadium in the 1930s, during World War II and beyond the integration of the majors in 1947.
snippet: Teams from the Negro leagues had a long and productive presence at Yankee Stadium in the 1930s, during World War II and beyond the integration of the majors in 1947.
